sqlMap.select: select user_id from users where user_id = #user_id#
select user_id, user_nickname, user_name from users where user_id in (select followee from follow where follower = #user_id#)
select user_id, user_password, user_nickname from users where user_id=#user_id# and user_password=#user_pw#
select user_nickname from users where user_nickname = #user_nickname#
sqlMap.update: update users set user_password = #password# where user_id = #email#
